title: Pre season 6 adc items build path

embed.description: Preseason starts on November 11th, meaning all Ranked progress will be soft-wiped at that date and end-season rewards will be distributed. [ Note ] The updated Champion Select may not be in the Preseason patch, which is why I haven't included it in the notes. You can find an in-game preview of it .

body: Now that preseason 6 patch is almost coming and there are a lot of new items for adc, how do i build now? Do i still go for the typical ie,stattik shiv/phantom dancer, bortk/bloodthirster, lw and defensive item build? On adcs?

replies.body: The thing is... your builds aren't meant to be binary anymore.

It depends on what adc you are playing. You will be rushing either one of these items most of the time: {{item:3508}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3153}}. Essence Reaver rush for caster adc who can make use of the 20% crit it gives like Lucian who will auto attack between skills (double shot passive). Infinity edge for auto attack dependent adc. Blade of ruined king if you are playing Kog'maw or Vayne although it would probably be better to rush Infinity edge now on vayne. 
 
after one of the 3 items above you will want to get a {{item:3046}} or {{item:3087}} or a{{item:3085}} depending on which one you need more but honestly it doesn't matter which one you get because they give the same stats and the only difference is the passive. I would say Phantom Dancer for 1v1, Shiv for waveclear or splitpush and runaan's hurricane for teamfight. 

After that get your shoe either {{item:3006}} {{item:3158}} again depends on what adc you playing. Then get your {{item:3035}} if you need it or get the new {{item:3139}} or {{item:3072}}  or the new item death dance. 

Your full build will probably look something like this :
Auto dependent Adc: {{item:3031}} -> Either of the three attack speed item -> {{item:3006}} -> {{item:3139}} (new mercurial gives lifesteal, get this when enemy have thornmail or there is a zed or just whatever enemy that have targeted cc) -> {{item:3035}} ->{{item:3072}} or {{item:3153}} or Death dance.

Short range Caster ADC (Lucian): {{item:3508}} -> {{item:3046}} (get phantom dancer because Op 12% damage reduction passive) -> {{item:3006}} or {{item:3158}} -> {{item:3139}} or {{item:3072}} or {{item:3031}} or Death dance -> {{item:3035}} -> whatever you want. 

New Kog'maw build = {{item:3153}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3046}} --> {{item:3072}} or {{item:3031}} or {{item:3508}}.
New Vayne build path 1: {{item:3153}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3072}} --> {{item:3139}} or {{item:3102}} or {{item:3026}} 
New Vayne build path 2: {{item:3153}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3035}} -->{{item:3139}}  or {{item:3102}} or {{item:3026}} 

For Caitlyn, Varus and Miss fortune : {{item:3031}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3035}} --> {{item:3072}} or {{item:3508}} because of the synergy of their passive with Runaan's hurricane. 

Kalista build is exactly the same as the one now : {{item:3153}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3139}} 

Ezreal will probably follow Blue build more now because of the Triforce nerf : {{item:3004}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3153}} 

Sivir : basically the same as Lucian build but can build infinity edge first item instead of Essence reaver 1st item. 

Draven : {{item:3031}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3139}} 

No idea how to build new corki probably still the same Trinity force rush but Triforce has been nerfed so maybe you will be rushing Essence reaver. 

Honestly there isn't much difference to the build path. Just use your brains and think about what you need. 
CDR and Crit and AD = Essence Reaver
AD and Lifesteal and some defense = Mercurial Scimitar or Bloodthirster
Dueling power or to survive assassin burst = Death dance or new phantom dancer
AD Crit and Crit damage = Infinity edge
Teamfight item = Runaan's hurricane
Splitpush/wave clear = Shiv
CDR, AD and  Armor Penetration and temporary movespeed, attack speed buff = Youmuu's Ghostblade.

Botrk was nerfed so I'm thinking maybe deaths dance rush on vayne. I haven't tested it yet though. The cull is a good item if u can achieve 100 cs in 10 min and rush at 10. What's the difference between statik shiv and the other energizing weapon that gives one auto attack extra range? BTW with the heal on crit mastery and silver bolt prpcs should I get runans as well as lots of crits? Is youloos worth on vayne anymore?

My old vayne build was botrk, statik shiv, youloos, seekers, last whisperer, and some defensive item. Does this build work anymore? Also when is previous wounds really good? Against fioras?

 Also I've been thinking. Vaynes only problem with early game dueling is that she has no health. I believe it's less than 500 at the start. Vayne can win early duels with her w proc, so what if I started something like dorans shield or the Ruby crystal thing that gives you 150 health?

Get cull if it's an easy lane like you have a heal and they don't have poke or hard engage or whatever, otherwise dorans blade.

Lifesteal and attack speed and ms boost/drain helps that early game trading power immensely and is farmable in split items which helps too.

Be wary, the cull is stronger early than dorans. In some situations though you wont want to risk losing lane even if they don't have a strong lane against you and just because cull adds early power (through the sustain being much better than dorans) doesnt mean it cant scale off quick and be risky (because dorans gives more base AD) so all in all you have to choose wisely, since early game power can vary in lane and the strength of the sustain boost from cull isn't always as good as missing out on some AD for that form of early power and sometimes its better to have some more base AD so it's easier to farm and your harass/trading is slightly better.

For Vayne, I tried this build. Doran and 1 pot....and then I bought zeal on my first back. Continuing to buy the new item that increases the one auto range...forget the name of it but it is awesome! With the keystone mastery that heals on crit, this item is awesome. Plus you get a whopping 8% move speed from it...harass is great. Then I bought a bork...which I actually regret. And then IE. Next time gonna skip bork and get PD or maybe even essence reaver for the crit and cdr followed by ie as fourth item. Only played that one game since the new season but it was great! Good luck on the rift 

Burger Turtler
I turtle your burgers

the point of these changes is to, what i feel, is kind of shift away from what the supposed builds are. you didnt mention essence reaver, maw, mercurials and a couple other unpopular ad items. in season 6 theres gonna be a few paths for you to choose based mainly around each specific adc as well as your personal choice of how you want to play. the only thing i can compare that to is whether to build essence reaver on lucian or sivir. if you want to have more mana and be overall a more caster build, its not popular and it really might not be as viable, but if you feel you're unable to auto enemies in fear of getting totally shit on, then maybe thats how you can play. the reason you never see this in pro play is because adcs can always rely on their teammates and their warding to protect them to get the highest on-hit damage build as possible. in solo queue its not always going to be feasible since your team might be riven kat akali fizz and they cant protect you for shit. you also probably dont wanna build tanky so whats the next best thing? dealing damage without the possibility of trades that dont benefit you

tldr you can build what you want and less people will get angry at you, or just go meta
Or maybe you missed the part where the first item he stated was the Essence Reaver and the Mercurial is littered throughout the suggested builds...

Rito was going for item diversity and they delivered well.

You build, basically whatever the hell you want now. There are so many good items for AD Carries now, I'm so jealous as a mid laner lmao.
